title: The Old Spook
description: The Old Spook is a spy/mystery novel about a fictional CIA operative (spook) who interacts with real people and actual events in recent history on a global stage, confronting guerrilla chieftains, Mafia figures, and KGB agents in Miami, Mexico, and Central and South America. Experience the art of espionage and the craft of intelligence neatly packaged in a tale of adventure and intrigue. Available also in paperback at Amazon.com
author: Charles Ameringer
